mapper.select: SELECT t.id,level, t.parent_id as parentId, t.application_name AS applicationName, t.application_code AS applicationCode, t.date_time AS dateTime, decode(t.status,'1','启用','2','禁用') AS status FROM t_application t where t.status = '1' START WITH t.parent_id = '0' CONNECT BY t.parent_id = PRIOR t.id ORDER BY order_sort

SELECT app.id, app.remarks, app.date_time as dateTime,app.application_code as applicationCode, lpad(' ', (level - 1) * 4, ' ') || app.application_name as applicationName, connect_by_isleaf as isLeaf, --是否为叶子节点：1-是；0-否； connect_by_root app.application_name as rootName --当前节点的根节点 FROM t_application app start with app.parent_id = '0' connect by prior app.id = app.parent_id order by app.order_sort
